name: Fighter
description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor.

1.name: Fighting Style
1.description: Adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty.

1.name: Second Wind
1.description: Use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level once per short or long rest.

2.name: Action Surge
2.description: Take one additional action on your turn; usable once per short or long rest.

3.name: Martial Archetype
3.description: Choose an archetype that grants features at 3rd, 7th, 10th, 15th, and 18th levels.

4.name: Ability Score Improvement
4.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

4.name: Martial Versatility
4.description: (Optional) When you gain an Ability Score Improvement, you can replace a fighting style or a maneuver you know.

5.name: Extra Attack
5.description: Attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

6.name: Ability Score Improvement
6.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

7.name: Martial Archetype Feature
7.description: Gain a feature from your chosen Martial Archetype.

8.name: Ability Score Improvement
8.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

9.name: Indomitable
9.description: Reroll a failed saving throw once per long rest.

10.name: Martial Archetype Feature
10.description: Gain a feature from your chosen Martial Archetype.

11.name: Extra Attack (2)
11.description: You can attack three times whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

13.name: Indomitable (two uses)
13.description: You can use Indomitable twice between long rests.

17.name: Action Surge (two uses)
17.description: You can use Action Surge twice between rests, but only once per turn.

17.name: Indomitable (three uses)
17.description: You can use Indomitable three times between long rests.

18.name: Martial Archetype Feature
18.description: Gain a feature from your chosen Martial Archetype.
